channel.title: Jagex is a hacker's dream...(more inside)
channel.description: People always claim to have "hacked" Runescape. Now that is technically possible but not to plossible. Most people would agree that "hacking" Runescape is their dream. Well there is a next best thing believe it or not. If one were to break into jagex and or work from the inside people could easily get the source code/cache etc. for Runescape. I don't want to be the one to say this but if it happends I told you so. As we speak I am betting hundreds of people are thinking about this idea right now. As old people say..... A penny for your thoughts?

item.title: Jagex is a hacker's dream...(more inside)
item.dc:creator: @Sik_Skillz Sik Skillz
item.description:
@Sik_Skillz wrote:

when you get a job in jagex, you wouldn’t want to get the source code even if you can and your allowed. If you an coder and u code the source it won’t be the same sources we use, it’s very different now if you want to sell the source code its simple, you wont need to because jagex pays you a lot for coding.Now for the jagex database, they got it all “smarfed” out and in because its easy to hack the jagex database for i’d say almost any coder could including me but if you do you wont be getting your hand on the source well in my words the game is not an source at all so if you wanna be an bad ass id say code the jagex cache find the site i dont know shit i tried and now i know whatcha gotta do but ffs ( for fucks sake ) i dont give a crap i dont do p servers or rs i do program coding.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mrisace wrote:

jme_009:

By the time you are old enough and educated enough to get a job at jagex, you probably wouldn’t give a crap. I mean do you want to get fired for something like that? Who else would hire you after releasing jagex’s source code?

I had a mate who lived 3 miles from me and he moved down to work for jagex. He then became Mod Martin

item.title: Jagex is a hacker's dream...(more inside)
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Not every person who works for Jagex get’s their hands on the source code, only a few coders and the Gower brothers can see/edit it. Haxor, we already have the cache of Runescape. It’s in the private servers lmfao, but it’s not the latest one though.[quote=“Haxor62, post:7, topic:85054”][quote author=Criptic link=topic=124787.msg1219306#msg1219306 date=1177589763]

heck no i iant gonna be called mostly a gay lord working for jagex

why not it could be good pay and a good learning experience
[/quote]
Yea it would be very good experience for learning java but most good games arent made in java… Jagex wanted to be so “outhere” that they decided to use java for it. (I like java a lot but not for games like this.)[/quote]

.< Runescape isn’t made in Java, it’s C++ and about 6-7 other programming languages. The client is done in Java.

Read full topic
